nodes.title: FIX: ClickDetector was claiming to handle touch event when it did not

removed semicolon after class ending brace. fixes compilation with scala's java compiler
Code quality fix - Useless parentheses around expressions should be removed to prevent any misunderstanding.
Code quality fix - Array designators "[]" should be on the type, not the variable.
Code quality fix - Utility classes should not have public constructors.
Code quality fix - "public static" fields should be constant.
Code quality fix - Synchronized classes Vector, Hashtable, Stack and StringBuffer should not be used.
Gather all modules into one single project
